title: Transfer to Garena plz
body: ever since the server moved its just impossible to play on NA from asia... desperately need transfer  to Garena TW..........

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we aren't able to transfer your NA account to Garena.  Keep in mind that Garena publishes and runs League of Legends in South-East Asia and not Riot Games.  

I wish I had better news >.<  Let me know if you have any other questions!
